title.narrative: Empowering marginalised families for developing self-sufficient and sustainable development

description.narrative:
The goal of this project is to develop capacity and confidence of marginalised communities to be able to meaningfully engage authorities and stakeholders on their needs and challenges in order to promote development in their communities. To achieve that, the project seeks to reduce poverty of the poorest families in Veal Veng and Phnom Krovanh district, Pursat province through integrated development approach promoting sustainable small-scale agriculture production including livestock raising and community based agricultural enterprise, and addressing immediate WASH needs of the target families.
This project was designed using participatory approach involving active participation of the community people in the target villages of Phnom Kravanh and Veal Veng district, Pursat province. The target communities are located in the least developed parts of the country with high levels of poverty. Due to remote location and poor road access, communities are placed at the margin of many government services. Findings from the design phase showed that subsistence farmers in the target communities have faced challenges in growing food to feed their families and to generate income to respond to needs of their families. Many households are affected by water borne diseases from lacking access to clean water and poor sanitation and hygiene behaviours. Their engagement with stakeholders is at a poor level limiting their knowledge and opportunities to raise their challenges and prioritised needs to service providers, including government authorities.
Through the project, it is expected that farmers will have increased capacity to improve their household incomes and livelihoods as well as be more resilient to climate change. Farmer representatives from the poorest and the most marginalised families will have their capacity and confidence developed in order to be able to make an influence in the decision for development in livelihoods and WASH.
